news_header: Interest in consignment stores and repair services for household appliances is rising in Russia due to soaring living costs. Consumers are opting for second-hand goods over new products, especially in light of economic instability and rising inflation.
news_original_title: Why Russia is seeing a rise in demand for second-hand goods
news_text: The demand for used luxury items has increased, particularly after Western brands exited the market following the Ukraine invasion. Repair services are also seeing growth, reducing waste and benefiting online marketplaces like Avito. However, the economic crisis is negatively impacting the waste management industry, as companies struggle with sanctions and financial issues.
